item.title: How to Turn Off Apple Mail Categories
item.description: This article explains how to turn off the new message categories feature in Apple Mail.

item.title: Apple Announces 'Find My' Network Availability in South Korea
item.description: Apple today announced that its Find My network is now available in South Korea.

item.title: RSS Buddy Digest: 1 Less Important Articles
item.description:
Expected iOS 19 Compatibility

An article on MacRumors, titled iOS 19 Expected to Run on These iPhones, provides an exclusive list of iPhones that are expected to be compatible with iOS 19. This compilation could be particularly useful for users thinking about upgrading their devices or for those curious about the longevity of their current model.
